comments.body:
This will need a `run_exports` specify the ABI compability if things are built against it. This could for example be the following:
```suggestion
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage(barvinok, max_pin="x.x.x" }}
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage("barvinok", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
